name: Lambertus Robben
description: I’m 36, from the Netherlands, living in Germany, and I started the EUMS brand to help people understand the EU better after Brexit showed me how little most of us really know about it.

name: Pablo Reverdy Gómez
description:
I'm Pablo, from Barcelona. I'm both a Spanish and French national with a multicultural background which has fueled my passion for European politics and design research. 
 I specialize in design research and brand identity, and what truly excites me is merging design techniques with politics. I love making complex political concepts easier to grasp through clear, engaging, and visiually appealing designs. 
 By simplifying political education about Europe, I hope to make it more accessible and help people engage with it and understand the political landscape.

name: Elliot Baudeweyns
description:
Hey! I'm Elliot, passionate about politics, international relations, and online ecosystems. With a Bachelor's degree in Public Administration and a Master's in International Security and Development, I strive to strengthen informed democracies across the EU. 
 EU Made Simple is the perfect place to do so - I interview experts, connect like-minded organizations, and represent the platform beyond its great videos. 
 I'm always open to questions, feedback, or proposals, so don't hesitate to reach out!

name: Miguel David
description: I run the social media channels at EU Made Simple because Europe isn't just where I live - it's who I am. Based in Lisbon and pursuing a master's in International Studies, I'm passionate about making EU politics engaging and accessible, bringing its stories, challenges, and debates to life for everyone.

name: Paul Bekaert
description: I’m 22, from France, and I am European. I really got into EU politics after the Russian invasion of Ukraine, and since then, I’ve been dedicated to making European politics more accessible.

name: Jonathan Reinders
description:
Hi everyone! I'm Jonathan, from Munich. I am a Spanish-socialized German, living in the northernmost city of Italy, with Austrian humor, looking like a Swede, and loving to travel the Balkans. Let's say: I am European. 
 I love languages. I'm an absolute sports fan. When it comes to football, my heart doesn't beat red but black and yellow. 
 I am a journalist, passionate about video editing and storytelling. And I am curious: about 450 million faces and stories. From 27 countries. That's why I work at EUMS.
